name: MattNoyesWeather
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get regular weather updates and forecasts from meteorologist Matt Noyes. After enabling the Matt Noyes Weather skill from Alexa Skills, you can just ask Alexa for your flash briefing or what’s in the news and you’ll get Matt’s weather forecast. You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime. Forecasts are updated on days Matt is working, most often Monday through Friday mornings on NBC10 Boston and NECN (New England Cable News). Forecasting New England and Boston weather for nearly two decades, Matt has made a name for himself by providing unparalleled detail and insight in his forecasts and by his determination to deliver the best information possible to the greatest number of people, to help Bostonians and New Englanders be best prepared for what nature has in store. You can find Matt on all social media platforms, at the TV station website and app, and on his own website, mattnoyes.net. You can also search your App Store for the Matt Noyes Weather app.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
